posts.post_title: Paddy Livingston T207 (A on shirt version)
posts.post_content:
Still looking to purchase a nice creaseless Paddy Livingston T207 (A on shirt version.) 

Will pay strong for a nice example to finish all the Livingston variations. Plenty of trade bait as well.

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
